rows.label: qst702603_msg0001
rows.name:
Ahhhh!
I feel so much better!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0002
rows.name: You really saved my bacon, thank you.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0003
rows.name:
The name's Parvi. Just an adventurer
with a dream of finding fame and
fortune here in the Dannagh Desert.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0004
rows.name:
Though "dream" implies it might not
actually happen, eh? Believe you me,
it's definitely gonna happen. It has to.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0006
rows.name:
I was feeling pretty ravenous so I
chowed down on a couple of Red
Pollen Orbs I found in a green barrel.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0007
rows.name:
But then my body got really hot so I
gulped down a whole bunch of water.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0008
rows.name:
I waited for my partner but they never
came back. When I ran out of food and
water, I thought I was gonna die.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0010
rows.name:
Why didn't you just go back
to the capital?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0011
rows.name: I didn't want to give up my lead!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0012
rows.name:
The legends say that the Dannagh
Desert has gold just lying around all
over the place for anyone to take.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0013
rows.name:
And my partner and I made it out here
before anyone else!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0014
rows.name: ...Hey, Adel?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0015
rows.name: Er, is that true? About the gold?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0016
rows.name:
Ask any Iiran schoolchild and they'll
tell you that it is.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0017
rows.name: No more than a legend, then?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0018
rows.name:
Tch, I shoulda known you were
non-believers.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0019
rows.name: Steady on. We're not doubting you.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0020
rows.name:
We didn't come all the way out here
to dig because of some childhood
fairytale, you know.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0021
rows.name:
I've got a machine that tells you
exactly where the gold is.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0022
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0023
rows.name: So that's your hidden weapon?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0024
rows.name:
Precisely! My partner hauled it up
in a load of salvage.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0025
rows.name:
All it needs is a Gravitonic Clutch and
it should be up and running and sniffing
out gold like nobody's business.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0026
rows.name:
The machine doesn't look that
amazing to me...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0027
rows.name: Parviaaa!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0028
rows.name: Sorry Dudan is slightly late!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0029
rows.name:
Slightly? I nearly shriveled up and
died of thirst out here!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0030
rows.name: Biggest apologies...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0031
rows.name: Oh, wait. It's you!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0032
rows.name:
Mo mo! Friends are same friends
who helped Dudan before!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0033
rows.name: Fancy meeting you here.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0034
rows.name:
Wait a sec. Dudan, you
know these people?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0035
rows.name:
Yes, yes! Friends were big help when
Dudan needed to get Gravitonic Clutch!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0036
rows.name: Wow. Small world, eh?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0037
rows.name:
Anyway, this isn't the time for
idle chit-chat. No siree.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0038
rows.name:
We need to get the Fortune-
Findermatron 4000 up and running.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0039
rows.name: Dudan on it!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0040
rows.name: All dones!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0041
rows.name: Does it work? Does it work?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0042
rows.name:
When switch on, machine will
run all over Dannagh Desert and
find gold that buried in sand.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0043
rows.name: Probably.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0044
rows.name: Wow, pretty impressive.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0045
rows.name:
It's some high-tech wizardry, that's
for sure.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0046
rows.name:
Right then, Dudan, my old matey.
Time to close our eyes, cross our
fingers and dream of gold.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0047
rows.name: Switch on...NOW!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0048
rows.name: Oho! It's back!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0049
rows.name: Did it find anything?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0051
rows.name: Dudan?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0052
rows.name:
I notice that the Fortune-Findermatron
failed to findermatron any fortune!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0053
rows.name: Mo mo...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0054
rows.name:
It turn out that Dudan's self-taught
engineering skills not sufficient...

rows.label: qst702603_msg0055
rows.name: You bloody Nopon!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0056
rows.name:
I sunk every last penny of my savings
into modding the FF4000, so it better
produce results, and fast!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0057
rows.name: Machine need remodel by expert!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0058
rows.name:
Like crazy inventor who live in capital!
Or anyone! Please to not pressuring
Dudan any more!!!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0059
rows.name: He seems to have cracked a little.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0060
rows.name:
Hey, please help me out.
Dudan has already outlived his
usefulness, so you're all I've got.

rows.label: qst702603_msg0061
rows.name:
To tell you the truth, I'm a little curious
myself as to whether there's any gold
in the desert, so why not?

rows.label: qst702603_msg0062
rows.name:
Yes, indeed. Consider my
interest piqued!

rows.label: qst702603_msg0063
rows.name:
OK then! Let's go and find someone
who's good with machinery.
